metadata.title: CVE-2021-35947 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The public share controller in the ownCloud server before version 10.8.0allows a remote attacker to see the internal path and the username of apublic share by including invalid characters in the URL.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
